ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Subject: Re: UPDATE 2 - we're getting there!
ygData.msgSnippet: I like the idea, but 18 seconds?  At level 49?  Is that really worthwhile? Won t most 49+ groups already have haste items for the tanks that this won t help?
ygData.messageBody:
I like the idea, but 18 seconds? At level 49? Is that really worthwhile?
Won't most 49+ groups already have haste items for the tanks that this won't
help? Maybe if it ran off a mana counter like Frenzy. Still I see this
like the group evac problems you mentioned. It would be nice at a lower
level, but by that time I would think it would only help a portion of the
group and at 18 seconds, that wouldn't make much difference.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 22, 2000 9:25 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Subject: Re: UPDATE 2 - we're getting there!


From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 22 Mar 2000 John_Senior@... wrote:
>
> Denon's Distructive War Cry
> Level: 49+
> Skill: Singing
> Description: This song is a true battle song, the bard gives the war cry
> and all group members (melee only) become so enraged that they fight at
> double the normal speed (doesn't stack with other haste items) and deal
> double normal damage. This lasts for 3 ticks only and is then unusable for
> 5/10 minutes (bard needs time to recover), a bit like Divine Aura. This
> song once sung does not stack with other songs.

This is by *far* the best idea I've seen for a new song.
Group-centric, very original, and doesn't tread on any other
class' specialties.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
